message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original price, but I'm not going any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $105?
I'm glad you're willing to compromise, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my last offer, so I can offer it to you for $112.50
I understand your concerns about the product's value, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway from my last offer, so I can get it for $107.50?
I'm starting to think we're close, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $107.50. I'm willing to go up a bit more, so I can offer it to you for $113
I appreciate your willingness to budge, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I think we're really close now, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $114. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle and make a deal
